scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Flagellation of Christ. Christ, with a halo and a crown of thorns, stands bound to a blue column. He is unclothed except for a loincloth. Several figures surround him, some appearing to inflict punishment. On the left, a man in a blue tunic and orange hood holds a hammer, looking up at Christ. Another figure in a pink robe and green leggings stands in the foreground, holding a whip. On the right, a group of figures, some wearing distinctive hats, observe the scene. One figure in a blue tunic and orange hood is actively whipping Christ. The background features a patterned wall and a tiled floor. The scene is framed by decorative borders.
